titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: This day was wonderfully wasted, for there were many interruptions in the forenoon, & we both lunched, and dined, with friends. The earlier meal was at the Castle with Gee: the latter at the School with Poole. I called vainly to see old John Wilson.
